info.description: Dolwin DSP JDI (WIP). More detailed description of Jey-Day infrastructure will be later.

dspdisa.help: Disassemble DSP code into text file
usage:
syntax: dspdisa <dsp_ucode.bin> [start_addr]
disassemble dsp ucode from binary file and dump it into dspdisa.txt
start_addr in DSP slots;
example of use: dspdisa Data\dsp_irom.bin 0x8000

syntax: dmem <dsp_addr>, dmem .
Dump 32 bytes of DMEM at dsp_addr. dsp_addr in halfword DSP slots.
dmem . will dump 0x800 bytes at dmem address 0
example of use: dmem 0x8000
